model.genetic

Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.genetic.Score
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Score>

    public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Score>

    Class called by the Genetic algorithm after the ten games of the individuals. It creates an object Score for every individuals (robots) generate by the genetic algorithm. It allows us to compare the efficiency of those robots.

    Version:
    1.0 - 17/11/15
    Author:
    BOIZUMAULT Romain, BUSSENEAU Alexis, GEFFRAULT Luc, MATHIEU Vianney, VAILLAND Guillaume
    See Also:
    GeneticAlgorithm, NaturalSelection

    • Constructor Detail

      • Score

        public Score(java.lang.String fileName,
             java.lang.String robotName)

        The construction of this object is based on the file we get when the games are over. It represents the different criteria to compare two robots.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the filepath of the score file providing by Robocode
        robotName - the name of the robot to compare

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Score o)

        Method used to compare two robots thanks to their score. We choose the percentage of victory as main selection criterion. Then if two robots have the same percentage, we choose the one which made the more damages.

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Score>
        Parameters:
        o - the score of the second robot
